channel.title: Cracker send message help

item.title: Cracker send message help
item.dc:creator: @iatchi1019 iatchi1019
item.description:
@iatchi1019 wrote:

ok so i cant get it to make it so it sends you a message if someone cracks a cracker on u and u get the prize. heres my code

if(itemUseID == 962) { int prize = Item.randomPartyHat(); int get = getprizes(); sendMessage("You crack the cracker..."); deleteItem(962, getItemSlot(962), 1); p2.sendMessage("Someone cracked a cracker on you."); if (get == 1038) { sendMessage("You get the prize!"); addItem(Item.randomPHat(), 1); p2.sendMessage("But you didn't get the prize."); } else { sendMessage("They get the prize."); p2.addItem(Item.randomPHat(), 1); p2.sendMessage("You get the prize!"); } }

how do i fix it?

Read full topic
